ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We would like to thank AusAID for offering Salley Alhassan the scholarship to study in Australia. Many thanks to the International Water Centre (IWC) educational team especially Brian McIntosh, Peter Wegener, Karen Benn and everyone at the IWC. We would also like to thank the staff of the Bolgatanga Municipal Assembly, Water Resources Commission, Ghana Water Company Limited, Community Water and Sanitation Agency, Environmental Protection Agency, Environmental Health and Sanitation Unit, National Disaster Management Organisation and Water Vision Technology who took time off their busy schedule to respond to our questionnaire.
